transcript: minimum wage work can make you a millionaire but not the way people think for example if you're flipping burgers right now that is not directly going to make you a millionaire for sure but the thing is is that you learn skills when you're flipping burgers that allow you to do the next thing you learn how to show up on time you learn how to follow instructions you learn how to communicate these are all skills that you're actually going to get paid to learn and those are skills that you will need on your path to becoming a millionaire a lot of people think that because they are working right now and the vehicle they're in is not making them as much money as they want that they think that it's the wrong vehicle to be in and that's not necessarily true because if you don't have that step you can't move on you can't pass go on the board
